text: Caroline Kaart (born Caroline Paterson Raitt; 21 December 1931 - 15 September 2020) was a Scottish-Dutch opera singer and television presenter. Kaart was born in Edinburgh. She was a mezzo-soprano. In 1982, she was honored with Order of Orange-Nassau. For many years, she was the host of Classic with Caroline. Kaart died on 15 September 2020 at the age of 88.Operazangeres Caroline Kaart (88) maakte klassieke muziek weer populair ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scottish singers Category:Dutch singers Category:Scottish television personalities Category:Dutch television personalities
title: Caroline Kaart
